sentence.Network_en: Zoroaster retained the ancient cult of fire.
sentence.Network_cn: 琐罗亚斯德仍然保留着古老的火的祭礼.

sentence.Network_en: Ever since ancient Greek times the name of Zoroaster has stood for mysterious Eastern wisdom.
sentence.Network_cn: 即使是希腊时期,琐罗亚斯德的名字是代表神秘的东方智慧.

sentence.Network_en: Three thousand years after the birth of Zoroaster the Adamic cycle will be ended.
sentence.Network_cn: 琐罗亚斯德诞生后三千年,亚当的循环周期将会结束.

means.word_mean: 1. Persian prophet who founded Zoroastrianism (circa 628-551 BC)

auth_sentence.content: The Gathas are seventeen hymns thought to be composed by Zoroaster himself.
